meanings.definition: A sunken area providing access to a basement or cellar.
meanings.sent1: The areaway outside the house led to the basement.
meanings.sent2: I walked through the areaway to get to the cellar.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the areaway was a secret tunnel to a treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an areaway, full of hidden memories waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The areaway was dark and damp, like a forgotten underground world.

meanings.definition: A passageway or alleyway between buildings.
meanings.sent1: The areaway between the two buildings was narrow.
meanings.sent2: People used the areaway as a shortcut to the other street.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the areaway was a secret hideout from imaginary enemies.
meanings.sent4: The areaway was a bustling thoroughfare of whispers and shadows.
meanings.sent5: She found herself lost in the maze of the areaway, surrounded by towering walls.
